Summary: Large Triangle/Shifted into Multiple Formations and also Stationary in Sky for 2+ hours
trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Longmont
There were no other sightings in Longmont on or around February 19th 2008
divs: sighting detailsat 6:40 pm, on tuesday 2\19, 3 very bright golden circular lights where seen in the eastern sky in a triangle formation above longmont. the 3 lights slowly shifted into a diagonal line across the sky and sat stationary. they proceeded to shift into a horizontal line across the horizon and then slowly spread apart. for the next hour, the three lights seem to move in a large rotation across the sky but sat stationary for long periods. i placed high powered binoculars on one of the lights and it was a very bright golden color with a little red. the light i was observing was absolutely stationary in the middle of the sky close to the horizon. as the three lights where slowly rotating over a large area of the sky, one rose straight up in the sky with an enormous white beam below it. the beam was so large that it spanned a great deal of the sky as the light rose. the light rose up and gradually disappeared. the stationary lights also seem to be rotating in place-they glowed very bright at times. two of the lights remained stationary in the night sky along until 8:15pm when they were gone. at about 8:30pm, i observed a large oval shaped white light moving slowly across our window--a window at the apex of our vaulted ceiling it passed slowly moving west towards the mountains. we live at the corner of hover and hwy 66 in longmont, colorado.
